name: Crustacean Vacation (Jaawholt)
description:
Crustacean Vacation is a party game for 2 - 4 people.  Get hit by the ball when it is your color to score points or lose them when it is not.

The game is playable in the browser but we highly recommend downloading the game and playing it locally.

This game is developed during the Brains Eden 2017 Game festival by team !Cake composed of students from NHTV Breda University of Applied sciences International game architecture and design.

The Team:

  • Programming
    • Johan holthausen
    • Ron van Essen
  • Art
    • Dorien van Duin
    • Tamara Tumbov
  • Design
    • Ivan Yanchev 

External:

  • Sound design
    • Partick Haynes

Special thanks to Robbie Grigg
